headline: Data Analytics Major at Illinois Tech | Data Research Analyst @ Sun Crop Sciences
summary:
As a master's student in Data Analytics and Management at Illinois Institute of Technology, I am eager to apply my skills and knowledge to real-world problems and solutions. I am passionate about data-driven decision making, business intelligence, and machine learning, and I have completed multiple projects and courses on these topics.

I have also gained valuable hands-on experience as a Data Analyst at GlobalShala and as a Data Research Analyst at Sun Crop Sciences, where I analyzed, visualized, and modeled data on various domains, such as marketing campaigns, crop yields, and market research. I used Python to automate tasks, web scrape data, and develop machine learning models, achieving high accuracy and efficiency. I also collaborated with diverse and cross-functional teams, presenting results and recommendations, and communicating effectively with stakeholders.

experiences.title: Data Analyst
experiences.description:
• Worked in the role of Project Scribe in a team of Data Analysts for a Data Analysis/Visualization project sponsored by Illinois Institute of Technology, United States and worked with a team of 5-members virtually.

Key responsibilities include:
• Evaluated different campaigns administered and their relevant metrics, including CPR, CPC, and expenditure, and extracted the non-delivering ones.
• Was responsible in taking meeting minutes and distributing notes.
• Assisted Team Lead in drafting emails and communication between sponsor and group.

experiences.title: Data Research Analyst
experiences.description:
• Collected and analyzed data on key crop variables including soil moisture and historical yields for pulses and cotton
• Developed machine learning models using KNN and Naive Bayes to predict crop yields; achieved 85% accuracy based on metrics like AUC
• Connected data analytics with agriculture to help drive data-backed decisions for higher yields
• Presented results and yield optimization recommendations to cross-functional teams in operations and sales

experiences.title: Analyst
experiences.description:
• Automated tedious tasks like data collection and analysis with creative Python scripts and analysis for company projects
• Web scraped targeted sites with Beautiful Soup to gather competitive market research data
• Constantly enhanced my Python skills through self-guided learning and side projects, becoming proficient with essential libraries like NumPy and Pandas

education.field_of_study: Data Analytics, Information Technology and Management

Affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada.

accomplishment_projects.title: Communication Service Application
accomplishment_projects.description: This is a PEGA version 8.6 based project. My role in the project was Senior System Architect. This application helps the customer to recharge their mobiles and cancel their recharges and can also get refund. This application is developed under Pega Platform.

accomplishment_projects.title: Crowdsourcing short squeeze dashboard
accomplishment_projects.description: This project is based on Python and its libraries. My role in the project was Data Analyst. A simple dashboard is developed using Python and data libraries. The Python fundamentals, Python data structures and data in Python are used.

recommendations:
Syed Ahsan Imam



Sree Ram worked with us in the capacity of Project Scribe/Manager during Data Visualization/Analysis Project under the umbrella of Globalshala and Illinois Institute of Technology and I was thoroughly impressed by his work management ethics. His inputs in making our final project outcome remained of imperative nature and played a pivotal role in getting things done appropriately. He was also very active in our day-to-day internal meetings which definitely show his disciplined nature.

I wish him the best for future endeavors!
